channel.title: Speaking the right language
channel.description:
Stumbled across this post that reminded me how important it is too speak the right "language" in person and via email/websites. As a one man company it's easy to use words that make perfect sense to me but not prospective (and existing) customers.
https://latenightcoding.co/the-right-language/

item.title: Speaking the right language
item.dc:creator: dgrigg
item.description:
Stumbled across this post that reminded me how important it is too speak the right “language” in person and via email/websites. As a one man company it’s easy to use words that make perfect sense to me but not prospective (and existing) customers.

Late Night Coding – 12 Apr 17

People Who Speak the Right Language Win - Late Night Coding

It's late afternoon. For the last 2 hours you've been waiting in line at your local DMV. Such a simple thing as registering a car, but nobody gets it here. You'd expect to stop by and say "Hey, my name's Jack and I've just bought a new BMW....

Read full topic
